---

## Resource type

- [ ] Textbook
- [ ] Journal article
- [ ] Course or lecture series
- [ ] Dataset
- [ ] Software or package
- [ ] Other

## Citation or URL

Provide complete bibliographic information and a DOI/URL.

## Suggested placement

Which module, track, or reading list should include this resource?

## Why this improves the curriculum

Explain relevance, rigor, and how it fills a gap.

## Access and licensing

- Is it open access?
- Any known usage restrictions?
